attachments.displayName:
Framed Art - Girl with a Pearl Earring by Jan Vermeer

Buy this framed art print on Art.com: http://go.art.com/O5EeBLa

Dutch artist Jan Vermeer’s enigmatic “Girl with a Pearl Earring” has intrigued art lovers for centuries, though (or perhaps because) very little is known about the painter and even less about his subject. The painting, sometimes called The Mona Lisa of the North, inspired author Tracy Chevalier to write a fictional account of the story behind the painting, and her novel became the basis for the 2003 movie starring Colin Firth as Vermeer and Scarlett Johansson as the mystery Girl.

Beauty, mystery, intrigue, artistry – “Girl with a Pearl Earring” combines all these elements. Custom framed with a classically styled, ornate Prague Bronze wood frame (with a foil finish that complements Vermeer’s skilled use of light) and with an overlay of premium clear acrylic that creates a crystal clear display and protects the print, this timeless work will make a strong accent piece in any décor, guaranteed to spark admiration, conversation, and imagination!

Enchanted by The Girl? Discover more works by Vermeer, one of the greatest painters of the Dutch Golden Age, in our gallery at http://www.art.com/gallery/id--a2931/jan-vermeer-posters.htm?rfid=978544

Girl with a Pearl Earring
Framed Art Print
By Jan Vermeer
